DataElement.preferredDefinition: An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data.:The operational aspect of a work procedure: how tasks are structured, who performs them, what their relative order is, how they are synchronized, how information flows to support the tasks and how tasks are being tracked.:A condition or state at a particular time._A written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material._Character string datatype stands for text data.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data.:The operational aspect of a work procedure: how tasks are structured, who performs them, what their relative order is, how they are synchronized, how information flows to support the tasks and how tasks are being tracked.:A condition or state at a particular time._A written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data.:The operational aspect of a work procedure: how tasks are structured, who performs them, what their relative order is, how they are synchronized, how information flows to support the tasks and how tasks are being tracked.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.

The operational aspect of a work procedure: how tasks are structured, who performs them, what their relative order is, how they are synchronized, how information flows to support the tasks and how tasks are being tracked.
A condition or state at a particular time.

Property.preferredDefinition: A written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material.

Concepts.definition: A written explanation, observation or criticism added to textual material.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 4/7/11 - no longer used by BRIDG; released for reuse by COPPA

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Character string datatype stands for text data.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2/19/13 Added AIM Foundation Model CSI reference. jc
